Step 4: Generate the 3D model by extrusion Extrude the 2D sketch along the Z-axis by a depth of 0.579 units (extrude\\_depth\\_towards\\_normal) in the positive direction. This would result in a 3D solid representing a rectangular prism with the following dimensions: * Length: 0.75 units * Width: 0.579 units * Height: 0.75 units Intermediate part 1 is now completed with the described boolean operation: NewBodyFeatureOperation.</description>

The coordinate system has the origin at (0, 0, 0) with no rotations or translations, and has dimensions of 0.75 meters in both length and width, and 0.0063 meters in height.</description>
